statements: DELETE FROM player_accounts WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com' AND password = 'password123'
DELETE FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_wins > 50;
DELETE FROM player_authentication WHERE last_login < '2022-01-01' AND player_id IN (SELECT id FROM player_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe');
DELETE FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 100 AND item_name = 'Sword';
DELETE FROM player_sessions WHERE player_id = 200 AND start_time < '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM player_scores WHERE player_id = 5 AND game_id = 3;
DELETE FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 100 AND quantity <= 0;
DELETE FROM player_friends WHERE player_id = 200 AND friend_id = 201 AND status = 'pending';
